cab.content: /This Document is the Property ofHis hjri?annivr Mjgstv's fcivnnvnft' It)Military Secret.1242398MR. C. LONGHIU Zfypwi Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 3rd January 1920. (Repeated to Constantinople under No. 87.) (Received 4th.) 72. 3rd January. Following from MallesonV telegrams : 1. Repeated to Teheran and Kasvin.. Tashkend telegram 31st December statesthat Reds occupied Yachol (corrupt group) station 29th December. Reds claimVolunteers, Krasnovodsk front, have lost all morale and make no serious resistance. 2. Agent reports Bolshevik garrison, Kushk, was 700 on 20th December. repairs to fortress progressing actively. 3.-Heavy snowfall throughout Khorassan 1st January.
